channel.title: About InnerSource Commons on InnerSource Commons
channel.description: Recent content in About InnerSource Commons on InnerSource Commons

item.title: Contact Us
item.description: The quickest and best way to reach us is to join Slack and ask your question in the #general channel.

item.title: InnerSource Commons Code of Conduct
item.description: Our Pledge We as members, contributors, and leaders pledge to make participation in our community a harassment-free experience for everyone, regardless of age, body size, visible or invisible disability, ethnicity, sex characteristics, gender identity and expression, level of experience, education, socio-economic status, nationality, personal appearance, race, religion, or sexual identity and orientation.

item.title: Members
item.description: The InnerSource Commons (ISC) community is open to all. Some community participants go above and beyond, and may be invited to become an ISC Member.

item.title: Our Sponsors
item.description: Our Partners Bitergia GitHub IBM Microsoft Our Supporters Comcast Fannie Mae Indeed SAP Sourcegraph Become a Sponsor

item.title: Privacy Policy
item.description: InnerSource Commons is an independent non-for-profit organisation that creates and shares knowledge about InnerSource for its members.
